name: Charlie Callari
text: These guys did an excellent job. The whole process probably took less than 10 minutes. Was impressed with the pressure washing and sanitizing part. Didn’t realize the water temp gets so high and the jets had so much pressure. Will definitely use this service again.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 stars Charlie! Yes, we use 200°+ water to blast away filth, knockout odors and destroy millions of harmful bacteria! We're so glad you liked our service!
